reviews.review: Отличные игра основанная на трех мерном мышлении . хорошо подходит для прокачки логики. и не стандартного мышления

[b]What more to say about "Portal"? It is one of the most inspiring games of all time. It influenced the puzzles/adventures genre as much as only few games did. Unique concept, extraordinary puzzles' logic, awesome sense of humor. Even nowadays it seems so fresh that the aged graphic won't bother you too much. Masterpiece.


Manometer: 9/10[/b]


The good
- Unbelievable sense of humor. It packs some of the most hilarious jokes you will meet in a video game. The writers had real inspiration.
- The main concept (a game about portals) and the gameplay (a gun that creates portals) are so unique that the game feels fresh even nowadays. You can' t stop creating portals here and there to see what will happen.
- The puzzles are very clever and have their own logic. You have to redefine the way your mind works. If you catch the spirit they are not difficult at all. Some of them are easily placed among the best puzzles ever. 
- Some views that are created among portals are so surreal. The trip among different axis portals (e.g. from a floor portal to a wall portal) is pure magic.
- The story is simple but the way it unfolds is very interesting. It is marvelous that although you initially expect to play a typical puzzle game (where you just solve the puzzles and move to the next level), suddenly the game completely deviates from the original plan.
- The robot is one of the most adorable characters aver made.
- The sound design is good enough. The robot's voice is unforgettable.
- The credit's song is epic. The lyrics are awesome. I can hear it on repeat for hours.
- Its price (when it is on sale) is a steal. Just buy it.

The bad
- There are some familiar collision issues of the Source Engine, but because of the nature of the game they won't bother you as much as Half Life.
- Everything is so well designed except of the android you control (which you can see only via a portal). I would prefer something more unique than a simple human.
- The visuals start to feel a little bit outdated. Although a puzzle game like this does not need something too impressive to be playable, "Portal" is so classic now that deserves a remaster.

Great game! 10/10 would recommend to a friend, especially if you're a fan of sci-fi, dry humour, mystery and cake. I really enjoyed the development of skills within this game, by increasing the difficulty for each level but keeping it interactive and fun, so it is great for someone who is not an expert gamer, like myself.

Honestly when I think about all the jobs I've held(doctor, police officer, fireman, gardner, astronaut) the one that I am most proud of is definitely being a SCIENTIST. Portal will teach the player the importance of conducting a test of sorts with what is central to the game, the portal gun. Dive into this game and slowly learn the mind-bending mechanics at play here whilst also learning what it means to be ALIVE. Masterpiece of a story that I do not believe any other game can even come close to.

This game changed my life. Before I started it I was a lowly neckbeard virgin who lived in my mom's basement. The typical redditor, if you will. After playing it I immediately started forming a harem of beautiful women and moved out into a mansion. I'm an All-Star NBA, NFL, NHL, and MLS legend. I have found the cure to cancer, ended the War on Drugs, reversed the Holocaust, and killed Bin Laden before 9/11. I have reached a supreme state of being due to this game and this game only. Be careful before playing, this game may just change your life.
One of the best games of all time.

I remember falling in love with this series watching clips of G4 on Comcast on Demand. I finally got to play it years later on XBox, and I got it on Steam in the Valve Pack. It'll never die in my heart.

Can't wait to play the Portal Reloaded mod story. That and Portal Stories: Mel made this game a gift that keeps on giving.

Have nothing to do? Replay Portal.

Portal é um jogo conceitualmente simples, longe de ser fácil, que impulsiona o raciocínio do jogador. A lógica é explorada do início ao fim, com um suave humor para esfriar os axônios, passar o nível utilizando um número limitado de portais, ou concluí-lo em poucos segundos é, sem dúvida, testar o pensar e o executar. À vista disso, temos  como produto um jogo original, que por sinal inspirou vários outros títulos, apreciável no que diz respeito ao enredo, amalgamando a perspectiva lógica e humorística,  e sua dificuldade, que é acentuada caso o candidato finalize-o por completo.

Confesso-lhe que, no momento em que escrevo, terminei a obra há quase dois anos, todavia, a sensação ainda é latente. Dito isso, é com grande prazer que digo, sem medo algum, que Portal é uma obra atemporal, dotada de magnificência necessária para agradar os mais diversos e exigentes consumidores, incluo-me também, de jogos de puzzles. É fenomenal!

É louvável a cautela que tiveram em respeitar as leis da física, isto é, energia cinética e gravitacional, é perceptível as implicações que estas têm no jogo, tudo em sua devida sintonia. Outrossim, é válido pontuar que, no aspecto da dublagem da personagem Glados, está, deveras, maravilhoso, de muita maestria a música tocada nos créditos.
Minha bainha de mielina foi utilizada com fervor, principalmente, nos níveis cronometrados. Recomendo-o, é claro, para todos aqueles que buscam desafios, para isso faça os 100%, e os novos usuários do Steam, que ainda estão no processo de conhecimento da plataforma e seus títulos, até porque apresenta uma considerável vantagem no quesito de preço por hora jogada.
